page.title: 20OLD GRIMSBY CHURCH CUSTOM
page.content: Near our school is a{very old church called Holy Trinity and the Virgin Mary at Old Clee.Today the church {floor}is covered in {stone }with a red {carpet} on top. Hundreds of years ago the floor was{bare earth}and was covered with {rushes}which were cut in the marshes close by. They always put clean rushes down for {Trinity Sunday because this was a special day as the church is named after the Trinity.They cut{grass}in the{Bescars}instead of rushes because the land had been drained during the{1800's.}Today they cut rushes at{Croxby Ponds, }about 10 miles away.They are carried by the people in{procession}to the church on Trinity Sunday and put on the church floor.The hymn'All Things Bright And Beautiful'is sung at this{special {evening service}followed by{supper}and {entertainment}in the{church hall.
